settings.title: WE ARE MOTA.
settings.subheading: JOIN OUR VIP CLUB & GET EXCLUSIVE DISCOUNTS

settings.title: WHO WE ARE
settings.text:
We are a Company formed by a team of Car enthusiasts that set out to give like minded people the opportunity to own classic luxury cars without necessarily being able to purchase one for themselves.

We run promotional giveaways that give back to our members, Mota Team also set out to give back to the community by partnering and raising funds for charities, Clubs and Organisations.

Mota team brings our passion for luxury cars, supporting the Community and Charities all together in one place. This is how Mota Team was formed

settings.title: OUR CHARITY PARTNER
settings.text:
Mota Team is proud to announce that we have partnered with the CFA to raise much needed funds to purchase equipment to help prevent and fight devastating Bushfires.

The CFA respond to a range of hazards, support communities to be fire ready and they work as one with emergency services partners.

CFA's people’s skills, experience and expertise in fire prevention, preparedness and response across a range of landscapes makes the CFA unique in the emergency services sector.

CFA provides statewide fire and related emergency coordination

*Wildfire suppression *Structural firE suppressionTransport-related
fire suppressionRoad
rescueTechnical
rescue, such as high angle, trench and mine operationsHazardous
materials transportation and storage incidentsWorking
with Forestry industry brigadesOther
emergency activities including flood assistance.

The CFA saves lives and livelihoods and MOTA Team couldn't be prouder to play a part in the great work the CFA are doing.

settings.title: What is Mota Team?
settings.text: Mota Team is an automative car club which supports charities, local businesses and gives you the chance to win luxury cars and prizes.

settings.title: Is it a one off payment?
settings.text:
You can choose to sign up for a monthly membership or buy tickets into one draw. Individual tickets into a car giveaway is a one time payment only. 

The monthly membership is the best value and can be canceled at any time.

settings.title: How Many entrants are in each draw?
settings.text:
Mota Team provide a competitive chance for our members, that's why we've capped our promotions.

Each promotion has a different cap depending on the value of the prize.

If we satisfy the entrant cap before the close date, we will automatically close the draw, aach entrant can hold multiple entries in our draws.

settings.title: Is it open to everyone in Australia?
settings.text:
This giveaway is permitted to be run in all states and territories in Australia with the exception of South Australia. Once we’ve started the draw it means that one
lucky person in Australia has to win.

settings.title: Frequently asked question
settings.text: Use this text to answer questions in as much detail as possible for your customers.

settings.title: Is this a promotional giveaway?
settings.text:
Yes, this is a trade promotional giveaway run by Mota Team. We fund the entirety of the project including the purchase price of the vehicle, legal fees, permits,
marketing, etc.

settings.title: I cant log into my account
settings.text: If you can’t remember your password, please follow the prompts to reset your password. If you can’t log in because of a technical issue, please email us at info@motateam.com

settings.title: What payment types do you accept?
settings.text: We currently accept Visa, MasterCard, amex, afterpay and PayPal!

settings.title: Is your payments secure?
settings.text: We take payment security seriously. Our website is protected and encrypted by secure socket layer technology (SSL). Our payment gateways are also protected by further security measures.

settings.title: Can I cancel my entries?
settings.text:
You can cancel your membership at anytime.

If you are not entirely satisfied with your purchase, we’re here to help.

Please email us at info@motateam.com and
we will come back to you with a solution
